incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to Twilio Korean Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience inbound call failures to Twilio Korean phone numbers. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing inbound call failures to Twilio Korean phone numbers has been identified. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Dish Network in the US Over Long Code and Short Code Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Dish Network in the US over long code and short code numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 10 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 11 April 2024 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The MTS network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 April 2024 at 21:30 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 23:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTS Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting an emergency maintenance from 11 April 2024 at 12:00 PDT until 11 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind Tre Italy is conducting an emergency maintenance from 11 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 11 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Sydney, Australia (AU1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in AU1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Australia / New Zealand.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 April 07:00 until 13 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Australia / New Zealand.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 13 April 07:00 until 13 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Sydney, Australia (AU1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in AU1.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 18 April 2024 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US handsets via US short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 20 April 2024 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from New Zealand handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 10 April 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 22:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany mobile and landline phone numbers, and from and to France toll free, mobile and landline phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
10 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
15 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
17 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 17 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
22 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
24 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
